name: @elizaos/aws-examples
description: elizaOS AWS Lambda worker examples and test clients

scripts.build:typescript: cd typescript && npm install && npm run build
scripts.deploy:typescript: npm run build:typescript && sam deploy --parameter-overrides RuntimeLanguage=typescript
scripts.deploy:python: npm run build:python && sam deploy --parameter-overrides RuntimeLanguage=python
scripts.deploy:rust: npm run build:rust && sam deploy --parameter-overrides RuntimeLanguage=rust
